plays.text: Even Strength Goal Scored by Adam Larsson assisted by Patrik Elias and Andy Greene
Penalty to Victor Bartley 2  minutes for High-sticking
Powerplay Goal Scored by Eric Gelinas assisted by Scott Gomez and Steve Bernier
Penalty to Dainius Zubrus 2  minutes for Interference - Goalkeeper
Even Strength Goal Scored by Mike Fisher assisted by Craig Smith and Victor Bartley
Penalty to Jacob Josefson 2  minutes for Hooking
Bench penalty to New Jersey Devils 2  minutes for Too many men/ice - bench(served by Peter Harrold)
Penalty to Shea Weber 2  minutes for Holding
Empty Net Goal Scored by Michael Cammalleri assisted by Mark Fraser and Stephen Gionta
